title: Fuzzy Constraint Learning for Parameterized Programming Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of Basic Programming Concepts and Elementary Linear Algebra Knowledge
context.additional_context: Conducted in a mobile-based microlearning environment utilizing personal devices (BYOD). Acquiring parameter optimization techniques applicable to language domains (translation/NLP)

learning_goals: Students can explain the solution process for parameter programming problems using fuzzy constraint modeling techniques.
Students can implement constraint clustering and generalization processes based on ANFIS (Adaptive Neural-Fuzzy Inference System) using simulation tools.
Students can solve SVM classifier margin optimization problems through fuzzy logic-based constraint intensity analysis.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
